task.title: Editing/Adding links to the Project Menu
task.shortdesc: For each project you can customize your navigation buttons by using the Edit project menu in your dashboard.

step.cmd: Click on the Edit project menu option in the Utilities column (on the right side of the dashboard).
Alternative step 2: Click on the Add link button in the right corner. Alternative Step 2:Click on Edit option associated with the page you would like to work with (beneath the operations column).
Fill out the Edit project menu form. The title and path fields are required.
Click on Save to ingest your new project menu.

p.b: In the screenshot below, you can see the different project menu options. These are customized to that particular project.
